attributes.action: Fine people for wrongly calling out Ambulances.
attributes.additional_details:
Emergency Ambulances are supposed to only attend life-threatening conditions. Yet, they are forced to attend to 16 year olds who pass out through excessive drinking, frequent callers who refuse treatment, middle aged woman who have stubbed their toe. They also attend people who could quite easily drive to A&E or go to a walk in centre etc. This needs to come to an end, by calling out Emergency Ambulances to very minor incidents they are pulling Ambulances from the road putting lives at risk.

Ambulances should somehow be able to fine people for abusing the 999 system.

rejection.details: Please see petitions "NHS should not be free to all" and "Emergency services for Emergencies only!".
